name: The Reset Life of a Game Addict
author: FineMan, LuckyKi
content: Jinho Lee has just completed the ultimate challenge in the game Reset Life, where he had to experience all 99 possible endings to reach the final victory. After six years of intense gameplay, he feels a sense of achievement—but also an overwhelming emptiness. With nothing left to conquer in the game, Jinho finds himself at a loss, unsure of what to do next.However, this feeling of burnout becomes the catalyst for an even greater transformation. Suddenly, Jinho’s life is reset in ways he never im
